Title: Whitepad
Description: Whitepad is a digital whiteboard with an infinite canvas. It is designed to be used on a tablet, with a stylus, or on a PC, using a mouse.
HomeWiki:
Whitepad

Description
Whitepad is a digital whiteboard with an infinite canvas. It is designed to be used on a tablet, with a stylus, or on a PC, using a mouse.

Features
Infinite space to create diagrams and drawings.
Allows you to save your work for later.
Supports several marker colors.
